    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Hot and cold waters circulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zirkulation des heißen und kalten Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circulation d'eaux chaudes et froides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circulação das águas quentes e frias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circolazione delle acque calde e fredde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυκλοφορία καυτών και κρύων νερών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circulación de las aguas calientes y frías</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates that heating causes the circulation of hot water and cold water inside a pitcher.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cold water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">convection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pitcher</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, daß die Heizung
die Zirkulation des Heißwassers und des kalten Wassers innerhalb 
eines Kruges verursacht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre que la chauffage cause la 
circulation de l'eau chaude et de l'eau froide à l'intérieur d'un 
pichet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra que se aquecer causa a 
circulação da água quente e da água fria dentro de um jarro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra che riscaldare causa la 
circolazione di acqua calda e di acqua fredda all'interno di un 
lanciatore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα διευκρινίζει ότι η θέρμανση 
προκαλεί την κυκλοφορία του καυτού ύδατος και του κρύου νερού 
μέσα σε μια στάμνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra que la calefacción causa 
la circulación de la agua caliente y de la agua fría dentro de una 
jarra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zirkulation</string>
          </keyword>
